sim_community

Source: vignettes/sim_community.Rmd
sim_community.Rmd
library(birdsize)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

Simulation from a BBS route

Load and preprocess data. The new_hartford_raw dataset is the BBS survey route for New Hartford, CT.


new_hartford_raw <- new_hartford_raw

new_hartford_clean <- new_hartford_raw %>%
  filter_bbs_survey() %>%
  dplyr::filter(year == 1994)

head(new_hartford_clean)
#>   record_id routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year  aou count10
#> 1    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3160       8
#> 2    893559     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3340       0
#> 3    893560     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3880       0
#> 4    893561     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3930       0
#> 5    893562     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3940       0
#> 6    893563     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 4020       0
#>   count20 count30 count40 count50 stoptotal speciestotal
#> 1       7       2       2       0        14           19
#> 2       1       0       0       0         1            1
#> 3       1       0       0       0         1            1
#> 4       0       0       2       0         1            2
#> 5       1       0       0       0         1            1
#> 6       0       0       1       1         2            2
set.seed(22)

new_hartford_sims <- community_generate(community_data_table = new_hartford_clean)

head(new_hartford_sims)
#>   record_id routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20
#> 1    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7
#> 2    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7
#> 3    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7

#> 5    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7
#> 6    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7
#>   count30 count40 count50 stoptotal speciestotal rejoining_id  aou
#> 1       2       2       0        14           19            1 3160
#> 2       2       2       0        14           19            1 3160

Simulation given species’ names


new_hartford_names <- new_hartford_clean %>%
  left_join(select(sd_table, aou, genus, species)) %>%
  select(-aou)
#> Joining, by = "aou"

set.seed(22)

new_hartford_names_sims <- community_generate(new_hartford_names)

head(new_hartford_names_sims)
#>   record_id routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20

Simulation given mean size measurements


new_hartford_means <- new_hartford_clean %>%
  left_join(select(sd_table, aou, mean_mass)) %>%
  select(-aou) %>%
  rename(mean_size = mean_mass)
#> Joining, by = "aou"



set.seed(22)

new_hartford_means_sims <- community_generate(new_hartford_means)

head(new_hartford_means_sims)
#>   record_id routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20
#> 1    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7

#> 6    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994       8       7

Simulation given mean size and sd measurements


new_hartford_mean_sds <- new_hartford_clean %>%
  left_join(select(sd_table, aou, mean_mass, mean_sd)) %>%
  select(-aou) %>%
  rename(mean_size = mean_mass,
         sd_size = mean_sd)
#> Joining, by = "aou"



set.seed(22)

new_hartford_mean_sds_sims <- community_generate(new_hartford_mean_sds)

head(new_hartford_mean_sds_sims)
#>   record_id routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20

Simulation given a mix of AOUs and mean sizes

new_hartford_mix <- bind_rows(
  new_hartford_clean[1:32,],
  new_hartford_means[33:62,]
)

head(new_hartford_mix)
#>   record_id routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year  aou count10
#> 1    893558     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3160       8
#> 2    893559     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3340       0
#> 3    893560     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3880       0
#> 4    893561     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3930       0
#> 5    893562     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 3940       0
#> 6    893563     6218086        840       18   102  101 1994 4020       0
#>   count20 count30 count40 count50 stoptotal speciestotal mean_size
#> 1       7       2       2       0        14           19        NA
#> 2       1       0       0       0         1            1        NA
#> 3       1       0       0       0         1            1        NA
#> 4       0       0       2       0         1            2        NA
#> 5       1       0       0       0         1            1        NA
#> 6       0       0       1       1         2            2        NA

set.seed(22)

new_hartford_mix_sims <- community_generate(new_hartford_mix)
